resources.string: Mails will be send to this address
Mails will appear to come from this address
There is %d mails waiting to be sent
Did not get body or subject. Mail not send because it would be empty.
Authentication failed. Please check your username and password!
The server returned the following error. Please check your SMTP settings.
No connection to the internet found. Please establish connectivity and try again.
Your server\'s SSL certificate is not trusted by your Android system. Please import the certificate and try again.
Could not decrypt your password. Did you move the app to another device? Please enter your password again in the settings.
Unfortunately, this feature is only available in BlitzMail Pro. Please get this version to use all features and to support the development of this app.
The connection to the mail server timed out. Please try again later or check your SMTP settings.
Unsupported way of calling BlitzMail. Please report what you did to cause this to the developer!
Could not get attachment for mail.
File not found! Maybe it has been deleted since you tried to send the mail?
Could not send mail without required permission.
Don\'t have permission to access file. Please grant permission in settings!
Show notification in status bar after mail has been sent
Don\'t show notification in status bar after mail has been sent
Mail will be send when online
